original_text: That meat was part of the sacrifice which made them clean from their sins. It made them God's special servants as his priests. No other person may eat those things, because they are holy.
korean_text: 그들은 속죄물 곧 그들을 위임하며 그들을 거룩하게 하는 데 쓰는 것을 먹되 타인은 먹지 못할지니 그것이 거룩하기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: That meat was part of the sacrifice
which made them clean from their sins
It made them God's special servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그들을 하나님의 특별한 종으로 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: No other person may eat those things
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람은 그것들을 먹을 수 없습니다
